hero.tagline: First Real World Social Media Ever!! No filters. No fakery. Just raw, anonymous truth.

about.title: About the App
about.lead: DareToTruth is changing how we see ourselves through the unfiltered lens of reality.
about.card1Body: Share your authentic self and let people who see you in the real world be your mirror. No filters, no edits—just you.
about.card2Body: Never miss a connection — even if it's just a passing glance on the street.
about.card3Body: Drop a look, earn a bite. Local cafés and restaurants may reward your vibe with deals or free food.
about.quote: In a world of filters, we're bringing back the truth.

careers.title: We're Hiring
careers.lead: Join our team and help shape the future of authentic social feedback.
careers.ctaLine: Don't see a role that fits? We're always looking for passionate people.
